code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useAuth}from"../context/AuthContext";import"../styles/sign-in.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignIn(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError("");try{await login(email,password);alert("Đăng nhập thành công!");navigate("/");}catch(err){setError(err.message||"Đăng nhập thất bại!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"sign-in",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sign-in-heading",children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"sign-in-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",className:"sign-in-label",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"email",type:"email",className:"sign-in-input",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp email c\u1EE7a b\u1EA1n",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",className:"sign-in-label",children:"M\u1EADt Kh\u1EA9u"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"password",type:"password",className:"sign-in-input",placeholder:"Nh\u1EADp m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u c\u1EE7a b\u1EA1n",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"sign-in-submit",children:"\u0110\u0103ng nh\u1EADp"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"sign-in-already",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"B\u1EA1n ch\u01B0a c\xF3 t\xE0i kho\u1EA3n?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/sign-up",className:"sign-in-login",children:"\u0110\u0103ng k\xFD"})]})]});}export default SignIn;
